meanings.definition: Very pleasing to the taste or smell; delicious.
meanings.sent1: The cake was so yummy that I couldn't stop eating it.
meanings.sent2: The pizza looked so yummy that everyone wanted a slice.
meanings.sent3: The yummy cookies disappeared in seconds at the party.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the yummy stew filled the entire house.
meanings.sent5: The ice cream was so yummy that it felt like a party in my mouth.

meanings.sent1: The new car model is so yummy; I wish I could afford it.
meanings.sent2: The dress she wore to the party was absolutely yummy.
meanings.sent3: The yummy vacation package made everyone excited.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was as yummy as a melody from heaven.
meanings.sent5: The idea of a picnic in the park sounded yummy to everyone.
